Author: BEDBulimic
Text: imo full recovery extends more than just the calories, but also being able to conquer fear foods. Just cos I personally think that someone with a healthy relationship with food wouldn’t think twice about / get mentally caught up w food variety.  I think it’s rad that you’ve come so far as to eat with variety, it would be a bummer if returning to your old food would actually trigger a restrict-binge cycle (rather than binge-restrict). Maybe you could incorporate 1 safe old food/day for peace of mind but continue with your variety progress?  Idk bub u know urself best x

Author: sixteen_sosweet
Text: I'd say the variety is definitely important for true recovery
